name: DEC (Tamatea Denarie)
description:
In DEC you play as a program that is being chased by a virus, your goal is to transform into various shapes to bypass the firewalls.

Survive throw differents musics and have fun.

Context :      2nd Year of School - GameJam

Platform :    PC

Engine :         Unreal Engine 4

Language :   Blueprints

Task :               Lead Programmer

Duration :    5 Days

Team size :  5
